sys_update_version.name: sys_transform_entry_05b50ae8878b8e10ea5db99c8bbb35b4
sys_update_version.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_transform_entry"><sys_transform_entry action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><choice_action>create</choice_action><coalesce>false</coalesce><coalesce_case_sensitive>false</coalesce_case_sensitive><coalesce_empty_fields>false</coalesce_empty_fields><date_format/><map display_value="NeedIt records import transform">70b0700b8776c610ea5db99c8bbb35ce</map><reference_value_field/><source_field>[Script]</source_field><source_script><![CDATA[(function transformEntry(source, target, map, log, isUpdate) {
    // Map the 'state' field
    target.state = source.state.toString();
    
    // Map the 'request_type' field
    target.request_type = source.request_type.toString();
    
    // Map the 'requested_for' field
    target.requested_for = source.requested_for.toString();
    
    // Map the 'type' field
    target.type = source.type.toString();
    
    // Map the 'what_needed' field
    target.what_needed = source.what_needed.toString();
    
    // Map the 'when_needed' field
    target.when_needed = source.when_needed; // Ensure the format is correct for date/time fields
    
    // Map the 'target' field
    target.target = parseInt(source.target); // Adjust this line if type conversion is needed
    
    // Map the 'pred_cost' field
    target.pred_cost = parseFloat(source.pred_cost); // Adjust this line if type conversion is needed
    
    // Map the 'pred_hours' field
    target.pred_hours = parseFloat(source.pred_hours); // Adjust this line if type conversion is needed
    
})(source, target, map, log, action);
]]></source_script><source_table>x_58872_needit_needit_records_import</source_table><sys_class_name>sys_transform_entry</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>trk@geholding.no</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2024-06-24 06:38:24</sys_created_on><sys_id>05b50ae8878b8e10ea5db99c8bbb35b4</sys_id><sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count><sys_name>[Script]</sys_name><sys_package display_value="NeedIt" source="x_58872_needit">6ead8e780f603200cd674f8ce1050ed1</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="NeedIt">6ead8e780f603200cd674f8ce1050ed1</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_transform_entry_05b50ae8878b8e10ea5db99c8bbb35b4</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>trk@geholding.no</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2024-06-24 06:38:24</sys_updated_on><target_field/><target_table>x_58872_needit_needit_13_06_2024</target_table><use_source_script>true</use_source_script></sys_transform_entry></record_update>
